GSD.description:
drbd: fix potential silent data corruption

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 0452d32bfb419df65f8e200f5ddbf460fef48082. For more details please see the references link.
